descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Card Color is a focused VR puzzle game about thinking one move ahead. You face a grid of colorful numbered cards. Each tap rotates a card to the next color and reduces its remaining taps. Line up three or more cards of the same color to clear them, earn points, and gain extra time. Run out of time or taps, and the level is over.

At first it’s simple, but later levels introduce more colors, fewer taps, and unusual board shapes that force you to plan routes and manage risk. Some stages are intentionally “spike” levels that feel intense, followed by easier “cool-down” levels so you can breathe before the next challenge.

A clear color order bar shows which color will come next, helping you build satisfying chains and combos instead of just tapping randomly. Card Color is played entirely in VR with intuitive point-and-tap interaction, short level lengths, and no unnecessary menus—perfect for quick brain workouts or longer sessions.
